issue.title: Add an Annoyance Filter to Block Conversation Boxes at the End of News Posts
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Many news websites display conversation or comment boxes at the end of their articles, often powered by third-party services like Disqus or native commenting systems. These elements can be distracting, slow down page loading, and sometimes contain unwanted or low-quality content. While existing annoyance filters block some of these elements, many still appear on various news sites.

### Proposed solution

Introduce an additional annoyance filter specifically designed to target and block conversation/comment boxes at the end of news articles. This filter should work across multiple popular news websites and support customization in case users want to whitelist specific sites.

### Additional information

Some common platforms that power these comment sections include Disqus, Facebook Comments, Vuukle, and OpenWeb.
- Users who prefer engagement can have an option to disable this filter.
- This would enhance the readability and browsing experience for users who want a cleaner interface.

issue.title: umeng tracker
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://pkg2.zhimg.com/zhihu-dispatch/futureve-app-market(zhihuwap64)-release-10.42.1(24210)-arm64-v8a-bangcle.apk

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

umeng的中文名也叫“友盟”，这个公司是提供数据分析和统计服务，收集分析用户数据，常用于广告服务，广告商就通过这个公司获得用户数据的，建议禁止。要禁止cnlogs.umeng.com

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f390c12a-436f-4e03-aeef-ccea65987612)
还有一个域名ulogs.umeng.com，我不知道这个域名有没有在列表中，如果没有的话，顺便也添加这个域名，这个域名不在上面那个软件中，是我从其它地方收集到的。我觉得这两个域名可以添加到Adguard基础过滤器和Adguard DNS过滤器

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: App Store: 460177396
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://apps.apple.com/ru/app/twitch-%D0%BF%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%BC%D1%8B%D0%B5-%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D1%81%D0%BB%D1%8F%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%B8/id460177396](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.apple.com%2Fru%2Fapp%2Ftwitch-%25D0%25BF%25D1%2580%25D1%258F%25D0%25BC%25D1%258B%25D0%25B5-%25D1%2582%25D1%2580%25D0%25B0%25D0%25BD%25D1%2581%25D0%25BB%25D1%258F%25D1%2586%25D0%25B8%25D0%25B8%2Fid460177396) ### Comment > При включённой DNS-защите с использованием Adguard-DNS лента в приложении Twitch не прогружается. > > Шаги для воспроизведения: > 1. Включить DNS-защиту в Adguard. > 2. Убедиться, что выбран сервер Adguard-DNS. > 3. Запустить приложение Twitch с авторизованным аккаунтом с холодного старта. > 4. Нажать на кнопку «Отслеживается» или перейти на любую вкладку приложения. > > Фактическое поведение: > Лента Twitch не прогружается при включённой DNS-защите. > > Ожидаемое поведение: > Лента Twitch прогружается при включённой DNS-защите. Username: `@sevapopov2` ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.info.kansaimiraibank.co.jp
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.62.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

Email from `info-mail@i.kansaimiraibank.co.jp`

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

### Privacy
